meanings.definition: A group of ten carbon atoms in a straight chain.
meanings.sent1: Decanes are molecules made up of ten carbon atoms in a row.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the properties of decanes to understand their behavior in chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The decanes lined up like a tiny carbon parade under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, decanes are the reliable workers in the carbon chain assembly line.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful models to show how decanes form a straight line structure.

meanings.definition: A type of hydrocarbon with ten carbon atoms in a straight chain.
meanings.sent1: Decanes are used as a reference point in studying longer hydrocarbon chains.
meanings.sent2: The decanes in this experiment showed a high level of purity.
meanings.sent3: The decanes in the beaker whispered to each other about their carbon content.
meanings.sent4: The decanes stood out in the mixture like a row of soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent5: The student visualized decanes as a chain of tiny carbon beads in the lab.
